pkgmetadata.longdescription: # The Python Earnkeeper SDKThis sdk is used to create frontend components like div, span, columns, rows, datatable and etc., for python modules.Number of components will increase in the future.Developed by **Earn Keeper** team (c)## Developing LocallyInstall `setuptools`:```pip install setuptools```Build the package:```python setup.py bdist_wheel```Create a symlink to the package in your local python repository:```pip install -e .```Use the package as needed in parent projects:```from ekp_sdk import BaseContainerfrom ekp_sdk.ui import Chart```# DeployingThis repository uses Github Actions Continuous Deployment to deploy to Pypi and Pypi test.Commit and push to `staging` branch to deploy to Pypi TEST.Commit and push to `main` branch to deploy to Pypi.â ï¸ Make sure to update package VERSION in `setup.py` before pushing. An error will occur if the version is already deployed
